title: Tuclikk
author: Tuclikk
content: Sitting in a place where there's no hope for any income is big mistake which most of our youth are capable of but in the sense you get up stand on your feet and try for just a day I'm sure you will see a little change, in this case we all have to be self dependent not by depending on what someone promise to give.Most at times we do face some challenges of disappointment which is a bad idea.In this world we are now the little you have try to make an investment for your own future use.Something is better than nothing.I hope i do make a little sense for some of our brothers who stayed home for all day without going out or think of finding something doing. Only to eat what momma got from the market, this life is temporary remember there will be a time she will not be there for you we have to think wisely for a positive outcome even though it little at list time will come for the bigger one.

comments.author: Hewlet
comments.body: Quote from: Tuclikk on December 09, 2023, 10:19:53 AMSitting in a place where there's no hope for any income is big mistake which most of our youth are capable of but in the sense you get up stand on your feet and try for just a day I'm sure you will see a little change, in this case we all have to be self dependent not by depending on what someone promise to give.Most at times we do face some challenges of disappointment which is a bad idea.In this world we are now the little you have try to make an investment for your own future use.Something is better than nothing.I hope i do make a little sense for some of our brothers who stayed home for all day without going out or think of finding something doing. Only to eat what momma got from the market, this life is temporary remember there will be a time she will not be there for you we have to think wisely for a positive outcome even though it little at list time will come for the bigger one.as a man, it's an error to stay a week without doing something that will bring money to you. People who are already working are finding it very difficult to survive with a single stream of income, how much more someone that is not working.Even if you are not all that skilled, use the one you already have to make some cash that will help you to depend on yourself for your upkeep.Everybody has his own challenge that they are going through and you don't want to add yours to it. Even the Bible when most of us believe in talk say if you no work make you no eat so na serious offense if you decide not to do something with your life no matter how good your excuse of not working his.

comments.author: Barikui1
comments.body: It's quite logical that as an adult male, it's very wrong to stay idle, no matter how stressful or bad the job or business is, as long as it's putting food on your table, you just have to keep on doing it and pray for better days.The country we find ourselves bro, you don't need anyone to wake you up from sleep, your problem will wake you up.Look at what is going on in our economy and how it's affecting the price of things in the market, no right thinking adult will stay idle without any source of income.So bro let's keeps on grinding and pray for better days.

comments.author: AVE5
comments.body: A man who is aged enough to take responsibilities of himself and yet foldsehis hands at home while relying being a dependant is equal to a domestic slave because nomatter how eager and necessary you would be in need, you will only get it at when you are given and you have no choice than to humble accept it that way.You don't certifily gets exactly what you want and whatsoever similar of your need you are given, so you shall accept with no choice.It is practically that you don't own yourself so before you get even a stake from your request, you must be loyal to the fullest even though it is required of you displeasing yourself to please the other. That is usually the conditions of the dependants.It is literally said to be that you only gives what you have and not what you don't have, every dependants has a responsibility to stick to but at your point still a dependent in enslavely in need is your point of failures from responding to your responsibilities.Untill a man is foresighted to release what he is natured about being a man, he would always fell that relaxation even at the moments of rightful deprivation. It is uncalled for.A well planned man would always have the tough thoughts that yesterday was good, today is better while tomorrows that never ends would be the best of allnand get finding faults and strive to make it right. This is something that prompts and energies a man so he doesn't have to settle for less.Only man who knows how freedom of independence feels like is worth of striving at all costs to make a better living.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: Some people need a little push to get on with something meaningful in their lives, while others just need the right update and can make something good out of their own effort. With the economic hardship now, I don't think anyone is still sitting at one place doing nothing and hoping to reap from where they did not sow. "A little sleep and slumber, then poverty will set upon someone like a thief in the night." I know most of us are familiar with that passage.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Quote from: Tuclikk on December 09, 2023, 10:19:53 AMSitting in a place where there's no hope for any income is big mistake which most of our youth are capable of but in the sense you get up stand on your feet and try for just a day I'm sure you will see a little change, in this case we all have to be self dependent not by depending on what someone promise to give.We should not be too used to a particular comfort zone, we must learn to take risk, try out new opportunities, get focused about our lives and make determination and resolutions that would place us on higher chances, we should always take an assessment on where we are if they are such location that provides us with opportunities or not over a long period of time, we sometimes get so confined ourselves to a particular zone that has not been productive and yet we are being comfortable without making moves to have a change for a new thing, this is one of the self limitations we gives to ourselves.

comments.author: Richbased
comments.body: For me making it in the life is just getting the right connection and just like you said sitting in one place may not really be good as a man like you need to go out maybe events or social places, meet new people make new friends as this can also be a way of attaining the right information that would be useful to you because you might be lucky to meet someone that can unleash some secrets and information of making money in legit ways, if possible attend some entrepreneurs seminars, read books from successful entrepreneurs by so doing you're developing your mindset towards achieving your goals. We are in a digitized world now, almost everything is going digital so we need to make sure that we get the real update about things that's happening around us so that we won't be left behind. Another is for those of us that have connections and links should help others with the rightful information they need as there is joy seeing that you're the only one being successful why others meet you for money or help all the time what makes you a boss is your ability to lift others and show them the way to become successful just like you.

comments.author: Y3shot
comments.body: Always tell myself my own is my own, when I struggle to make money no matter how small it is I can always get my needs instead to run to people,  running people is always embarrassing and the truth is that people can't always solve your problems because they are not your responsibility . Entitlements is very bad,  no one who thinks of working don't end up getting least amount of money. The hand and the legs we have are meant to generate money for us.

comments.author: Obim34
comments.body: Sitting in a place and doing nothing, that is ridiculous, it is the worst that that can happen to a man, where else an idle person becomes the devils workshop. This is letting your mind open for laziness and corruption. But meanwhile I feel that just few of the Nigerian youths prohibit this attitude as most are always huzling one way or the other, so for those who depend on their parent and relatives for financial aid 8s doing themselves more harm than good. What a person earns by himself is being managed very well than what is being given to him. His/Her parent might get late someday and will be faced with the dilemma of catering for one's self mostly to the men which will at one time become the head of the family and needs to perform so many functions which requires money, so it is best we become self dependent

comments.author: Jamestown70
comments.body: Nice saying the best thing for a young man is to start hustling at an early age else it will become hard for you to hustle and do something better for your life there are many factors to my own understanding which limits a youth or rather makes him lazy to engage in meaningful things example of these things are1, laziness when you feel you are not strong or capable of doing some tasking job it will later become a burden for you to bear in the future nobody on earth is lazy except you want to be a liability to people which is very bad2, entailment mentality any body that always feels somebody must help him or give him something is already a doomed man/woman there shall come a time when those person who helps you would eventually stop and it will affect your life many Nigerians has this mentality including myself but I thank God I am free from this kind of thinking 3, unseriousness many people envy the likes of great men but they are very unseriousness.I urge you as a young man to come out of your comfort zone because years to come I bet you will never be comfortable at your comfort zone any more.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: Well everybody sabi say country hard no be small. Make we dey pray to God make him open our eyes to opportunities wey we fit put our hand inside to try to make out something for ourselves because to dey stay for house without nothing no be help wey we dey help ourselves. The challenge be say some people kuku lazy wey be say dem no still fit do something if you show dem way to go about certain things. Make we show working and God go blessing the work of our hand.

comments.author: teamsherry
comments.body: I swear na God go see man through even if u start wat will u accomplish some just keep grinding Cus they have faith not everyone that start end well but we still have to do something right

comments.body: Quote from: Tuclikk on December 09, 2023, 10:19:53 AMSitting in a place where there's no hope for any income is big mistake which most of our youth are capable of but in the sense you get up stand on your feet and try for just a day I'm sure you will see a little change, in this case we all have to be self dependent not by depending on what someone promise to give.Most at times we do face some challenges of disappointment which is a bad idea.In this world we are now the little you have try to make an investment for your own future use.Something is better than nothing.I hope i do make a little sense for some of our brothers who stayed home for all day without going out or think of finding something doing. Only to eat what momma got from the market, this life is temporary remember there will be a time she will not be there for you we have to think wisely for a positive outcome even though it little at list time will come for the bigger one.You are saying the fact Op that is the important thing we suppose know, if we continue to dey chop mama food one day she sef go say it to our face, say is this we are going to be doing without finding something good doing when we are not getting hunger when our mate are out there, time wait for anybody, we can't seat for one place dey think say something will work out for our life, if we dey the middle of friends wey no think of the way we can find something to change our life, those are not friends at all because we no go be broke and still dey look ourselves every day without anything working out between us, as this country take be now na to find way for yourself, na who work dey finally chop.

comments.author: I_Anime
comments.body: Yeah  Normal this time around no body is sitting in one place man gat to hustle. And focus this period nah n days nor b mouth dem tey dey tell person make e do something for this time around. Normally you need funds to make funds so if your funds never reach your budget nah to first focus on learning and gathering knowledge because that also means doing something and is better just sit down one place. As this old saying no food for lazy man

comments.author: Jessie2121
comments.body: As long as you think say nah your power after school and all that say you go make am on your own my broda nah lie, you go see shege, baba God must dy first oh. And the way we dy see some people dy tanda one place because them feel say no hope no fit be ordinary for some people oh, things wey people dy pas through plenty pas wetin we dy see for our eyes. Eh e no good to rely on one opportunity but make we think am, some people don try to make move but no way. The main thing be say anybody you see say you fit uplift just do am comot mind God go repay you.

comments.author: Makus
comments.body: Normally this life don pass when matured man or youth go sit down for house dey depend on em mama food, from week to week to month, so long as say you don pass teenager, you supposed to don get hand work or skill wey fit generate money for you, go  those wey like soft skills, we get many online skills wey dey pay well if truly say you dey serious. Just like the message wey papa David oyedepo been preach for Shiloh, e say you cannot be sitting down while trying to move forward, you have to stand up and take steps. When I hear this word e just sweat my belle, person wey dey houses day to day when nor dey go look for work naim do em self because, if you truly wan move forward for this life, you gats make moves wey go bring that opportunity come your way, nor dey expect manner to fall from heaven. There is a saying that heaven help those who help Dem self, even the bible say, "faith without works is dead" so as you still get faith, make you still try dey work out things, den you go see the hand of God for you life.

comments.author: Jegileman
comments.body: Life has gone beyond depending on someone for your daily expenses or consumption. You can live a good life if you want to live your whole life depending on promises from others. Life has gone beyond that and we call all see how life is treating each and everyone of us today. I don’t have a problem with seeking for help, but in spite of that, try and be hustling too in order to compensate for your daily needs. Even God only said he will help only those that stands up on their feet and want to work and not those that are still lying down and want the whole good things to come to them from their. A person can easily help someone who is already sitting down and wants to stand up than helping someone who is still lying down and want to stand up on their feet, this is just a logical example of looking for help from others while you’re also trying to struggle for yourself.

comments.author: odunybiz
comments.body: Quote from: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange on December 09, 2023, 05:57:10 PMSome people need a little push to get on with something meaningful in their lives, while others just need the right update and can make something good out of their own effort. With the economic hardship now, I don't think anyone is still sitting at one place doing nothing and hoping to reap from where they did not sow. "A little sleep and slumber, then poverty will set upon someone like a thief in the night." I know most of us are familiar with that passage.Some people are not sitting in one place doing nothing but their actions never good enough to put food on their table. This made me remember a man that I've met twice along where I leave begging for money claiming he came to visit someone around there and has no money to transport himself back since he didn't meet the person he came to visit. My question is: why will people continue to beg when they can work for money.

comments.author: Mr.right85
comments.body: Life itself is a learning process by which everyday of our lives is engaged by one thing or other and some times people gets to choose on what affects them but, I don’t think anyone would prefer to be affected by idleness, poverty or mediocre. Life is learning  and as long as one is breathing, he or she is expected to learn something new, start something new and do something new because nothing is wasted when energy is being put to it no matter how less of what it is, it actually pays in the end.  I know a lot of people are being bothered on what do start doing, the truth is, Do anything legal and reasonable, share your ideas with others to see how much help can come in, as long as one starts doing something, there are chances other doors will open. Idleness should never be any man’s resting place when he/she can start something new.

comments.author: Jenwi
comments.body: Not everybody likes being idle, the issue is sponsor. Many that want to learn trade and skill really need backup.if u just enter the street, my brother you go sweat tire to see something reasonable for that day. Another thing is vision and planning. Anyone who has vision will not squander the little that comes his way, from there he can be growing slowly and steadily. It all begins from our parental training. Every parent is expected to take the child to school at least procure SSCE  for their wards and if they can't push further atleast engage him or her in a trade of the child's interest, by this, people wouldn't have been idle and looking for who to beg from.
